Technique: ENGOBE; ENGRAVED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp, circular in outline. It has a highly developed dish. Whick and ribbon handle at the rear, from the disc to the middle of the body. Orangey-coloured paste. Surface with reddish-coloured coating, partially lost. Signs of use in the orifice for light.
